name: Dark Hill Museum of Death
description: Dark Hill Museum of Death is a journey through a virtual museum where uniquely themed exhibits are unlocked by solving puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2.4Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any card that supports DirectX 9 and above DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any modern sound card, including on-board.
